verbose_text: Collectively, our study suggests that AGR2 inhibits TNF-alpha-induced Caco-2 cell hyperpermeability by regulating TJ and that this protective mechanism may be promoted by inhibition of NF-kappaB p65 mediated activation of the MLCK / p-MLC signaling pathway.
evidence: AGR2 inhibits TNF-alpha-induced Caco-2 cell hyperpermeability by regulating TJ
